description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help Santa this Xmas by pressing the buttons on your gamepad in time to the flashing lights. Play with your friends and work as a team with up to 4 player cooperative gameplay. Includes 3 Christmas tracks to get you into the festive spirit
